```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library("car")
library("marfx")
library("dplyr")

mod <- lm(prestige ~ education + income + type, data = Duncan)

postsim(mod)
postsim(mod)
postsimev(mod)
postsimy(mod)

data1 <- Duncan %>%
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(education = mean(education),
            income = mean(income))
data2 <-
  Duncan %>% 
  group_by(type) %>%
  summarize(education = mean(education) + sd(education),
         income = mean(income) + sd(income))
foo <- partialfx(mod, data = data1, data2 = data2)


```
